title: 510. Conquer Triangle-Squares
description:
We’re spilling the secrets to making one of the most popular units in quilting – the triangle-square. We also share stories of how quilting is helping communities, some fun sewing hacks, how to assemble an on-the-go sewing kit, and how to make progress on your UFOs during the busy summer season.
For more resources from today's show, visit the show notes here: www.allpeoplequilt.com/magazines-more/quilting-podcast/episode-510-conquer-triangle-squares
Email us at APQPodcast@meredith.com.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:author: American Patchwork & Quilting
itunes:subtitle: Learn the tricks and products that make triangle-squares easy!
